definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Ps 149:9 ornament, splendour, honour (chiefly poet.)—abs. ´[[ה]] De 33:17 + 12 t.; cstr. [[הֲדַר]] Is 2:10 + 7 t.; sf. [[הֲדָרִי]] Mic 2:9 (but cf. infr.) Ez Eze 16:14; [[הֲדָֽרְךָ]] Ps 45:5, Ps 90:16; [[הֲדָרֶָךָ]] Ps 45:4; [[הֲדָרֵח]] Ez Eze 27:10; [[הֲדָרָהּ]] Is 5:14, La 1:6; pl. cstr. [[הַדְרֵי]] Ps 110:3 (but rd. prob. [[הדדי]] so Symm Jer edd.; O1 Hup Gr Bi Che);—

ornament Pr 20:29 (grey hair, for old men; ‖[[תִּפְאֶרֶת]]), Ez Eze 16:14 (fig. of ornaments of Jerus. as bride of ´[[י]]); [[פְּרִי עֵץ הָדָר]] Le 23:40 (H) i.e. fruit of goodly (ornamental, beautiful) trees, so AV RV & most, or goodly tree-fruit, LXX karpo/n cu/lou w(rai=on, so Di;—here would come also [[בהדרי קדשׁ]] Ps 110:3, ref. to sacred, festal garments, acc. to Thes al. cf. RVm; but read prob. on the holy mountains, vid. supr.

splendour, majesty De 33:17 of Ephraim under figure of a noble bull (cf. Di); of Jerusalem Is 5:14 cf. La 1:6; of Carmel Is 35:2 (‖[[כָּבוֹד]]); of majesty & dignity conferred by ´[[י]] on man Ps 8:6 (‖[[כָּבוֹד]]), on king Ps 21:6 (‖ id., [[הוֹד]]), cf. Ps 45:4 (‖[[הוֹד]]) & v:Ps 45:5 (but txt. perh. erron. Che:crit. n.); denied of suffering servant of ´[[י]] Is 53:2 (‖[[תּׂאַר]]); of dignity of good & capable woman ([[אֵשֶׁת חַיִל]]) Pr 31:25 (‖[[עׂז]]); of splendour due to warlike equipment Ez Eze 27:10; especially of majesty of ´[[י]] 1Ch 16:27 = Ps 96:6, cf. Job 40:10, Ps 111:3 (all ‖[[הוֹד]]); also Ps 104:1 (‖ id., under fig. of garment); further Ps 29:4 (‖[[כּׂחַ]]), Ps 90:16 (‖[[פּׂעַל]]); in combination [[הֲדַר כְּבוֹד הוֹדְךָ]] Ps 145:5; ´[[כְּבוֹד ה]] v:Ps 145:12; [[הֲדַר גְּאׂנוֹ]] Is 2:10, Is 2:19, Is 2:21.

honour, glory Ps 149:9 for saints of ´[[י]]; cf. Mic 2:9 of ´[[י]]'s glory as possession of his people, lost by exile & slavery: but perh. txt. err.; Hoffm:ZAW 1882, 103 prop. [[הַדְּרוֹר]], fr. their children ye take freedom (yet [[מֵעַל]] then hardly suitable).
